verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Immahi athisayillu dootalu aarbhatincha Dootalu velgutoda megamupai Yesu Sammatin raagaa sandintumu vega Aa......anandamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Boora shabdinchagaane vaanchalu theerutaku mitruni Chenta bhakthulandaru cheri Harshambu thoda paadi stutintumu Aa......anandamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhoomi gotramulunu deshaadhikarulunu Immaanuyeluche nyaaya teerpuponda Immuga memunu cherudu machchata Aa......anandamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Veyendla raajyamuna bhooloka raajyamulu Teerina pidapa mitrunitho memu Jayapradulamai nityameludumu Aa......anandamu{/lang-eng}
